alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 12:21AM CDT until September 06 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BENTON...NORTHWESTERN MADISON AND WESTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 1221 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles west of Beaver to 3 miles south of Eureka Springs to near Clifty, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Holiday Island... Gateway... Beaver... War Eagle... Urbanette... Hobbs State Park... Grandview... Clifty... Rockhouse... Cabanal... Beaver Lake... Larue... Pleasant Ridge... Best... Lookout... Oak Hill... Busch... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
